title: Introducing Tryll Engine 2.0: Faster, Smarter, Local
excerpt: Our biggest update yet brings 3x faster inference, support for the latest open-source models, and a completely redesigned API for game developers.
author: Tryll Engine Team

title: Building Your First AI Companion in Unity
excerpt: Step-by-step guide to integrating Tryll Engine into your Unity project and creating an NPC that remembers player interactions.
author: Tryll Engine Team

title: How We Achieved 40ms Response Times on Consumer GPUs
excerpt: Deep dive into our optimization techniques for running 7B parameter models at gaming-viable speeds on RTX 3060 and above.
author: Tryll Engine Team

title: BoscoTryll: Bringing AI to Deep Rock Galactic
excerpt: How we transformed a simple drone companion into a character with genuine personality using local LLMs.
author: Tryll Engine Team

title: Memory Systems: Making NPCs Remember
excerpt: Learn how to implement short-term and long-term memory for your AI characters using Tryll's memory management APIs.
author: Tryll Engine Team

title: 10,000 Developers and Counting
excerpt: We've hit a major milestone! A look back at our journey and what's coming next for the Tryll community.
author: Tryll Engine Team
